programme.title: Horror Rises From The Tomb [Spanish-Language Version]
programme.desc: An ancient warlock's spirit posseses people and forces them to commit sacrifices

programme.title: Creature From The Haunted Sea
programme.desc: A crook decides to bump off members of his inept crew and blame their deaths on a legendary sea creature. What he doesn't know is that the creature is real.

programme.title: Stripped to Kill
programme.desc: A female detective gets her cuffs out and goes undercover (and underdressed) at a strip club to snatch the killer of local strippers.

programme.title: Piranha (1978)
programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

programme.title: The Night of the Werewolf
programme.desc: An evil witch brings back to life the infamous Elizabeth Bathory, who was executed several hundred years previously for murdering young woman and bathing in their blood.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Lady Frankenstein
programme.desc: A revamping, if you will, of the 1980's classic horror movie showcase, hosted by Elvira, Mistress of the Dark. The son Elvira never knew she had abruptly appears and tries to take over her show.

programme.title: Sharkansas Women's Prison Massacre
programme.desc: When a fracking environmental accident rips apart the earth's crust, the resulting hole lets out prehistoric sharks from underground. The sharks target a group of women and trap them in a cabin.

programme.title: Piranhaconda
programme.desc: Two piranha/anaconda hybrid creatures hunt down the scientist who stole their egg and a film crew.

programme.title: Night of the Demons
programme.desc: On the night of Halloween, 10 teens decide to go to a party at an abandoned funeral parlor. BIG MISTAKE.

programme.title: The Exorcist III
programme.desc: A police Lieutenant uncovers more than he bargained for as his investigation of a series of murders, which have all the hallmarks of the deceased Gemini serial killer, leads him to question the patients of a psychiatric ward.

programme.title: Dominion: Prequel To The Exorcist
programme.desc: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa.

programme.title: Nosferatu (1922)
programme.desc: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

programme.title: Hush [B&W Shush Cut]
programme.desc: A deaf and mute writemust fight for her life in silence when a masked killer appears at her window.

programme.title: Frankie Freako
programme.desc: After calling a late-night party hotline that promises out-of-this-world fun, uptight yuppie Conor must battle the pint-sized forces of evil that get unleashed through his phone line

programme.title: Flesh Eaters
programme.desc: A group of young adults trapped on a desert island find the water inhabited by a violent form of flesh-eating organisms.
